default.title: Download Favicon from Website | Instant Extractor
default.description: Easily download favicon from any website. Extract favicons in multiple sizes. Fast, free tool for developers, designers, and webmasters.

home.h1: Instantly download and extract favicons from any website

qa1.question: What if a website doesn't have a favicon?
qa1.answer:
If FaviconExtractor can't find a favicon for a website, it doesn't just leave you empty-handed. Instead, it automatically generates a custom SVG icon using the first letter of the domain name. This ensures that you always get a usable icon, even when a website hasn't set up their own favicon. Here's what happens:

1. FaviconExtractor searches for the website's favicon.
2. If no favicon is found, it creates a simple, attractive SVG icon.
3. The SVG icon features the first letter of the domain name.
4. This generated icon is then available for download and use, just like a regular favicon.

This feature is particularly useful for:
- Placeholder icons while you're developing a website
- Maintaining a consistent look in your bookmarks or applications, even for sites without favicons
- Quickly creating simple letter-based icons for various purposes

Remember, while this generated icon is free to use, it's always best to create a custom favicon for your own websites to enhance brand recognition and user experience.

qa2.question: Is FaviconExtractor free to use?
qa2.answer: Yes, FaviconExtractor is completely free to use. There are no hidden charges or subscription fees.

qa3.question: What favicon sizes can I download?
qa3.answer: FaviconExtractor dynamically checks for all available favicon sizes on a given website. The sizes can range from 16x16 pixels up to 512x512 pixels or even larger, depending on what the website offers.

qa4.question: Can I use the favicons I download for my own website?
qa4.answer: While FaviconExtractor makes it easy to download favicons, it's important to respect copyright laws. The favicons you download are typically owned by their respective websites. If you're using a downloaded favicon for anything other than personal reference, make sure you have permission from the original website owner.

qa5.question: Can I check multiple websites at once?
qa5.answer: Currently, FaviconExtractor checks one website at a time. For bulk checks, you'll need to enter each domain separately.
